com.arjuna.ats.arjuna.coordinator
Class TwoPhaseCoordinator

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.arjuna.ats.arjuna.StateManager
        |
        +--com.arjuna.ats.arjuna.coordinator.BasicAction
              |
              +--com.arjuna.ats.arjuna.coordinator.TwoPhaseCoordinator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reapable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AtomicAction
public class TwoPhaseCoordinator
extends BasicAction
implements Reapable

Adds support for synchronizations to BasicAction. It does not change thread associations either.

Since:
JTS 3.0.
Version:
$Id: TwoPhaseCoordinator.java,v 1.1 2003/06/19 10:50:17 nmcl Exp $
Author:
Mark Little (mark@arjuna.com)
